title: Topo Gigio (Return of Topo Gigio)
synopsis: Created by Maria Perego, Topo Gigio has been a beloved character for more than two decades. This animated TV series features numerous exciting stories and introduces many friends.
voices: ['Nakao, Ryusei', 'Yada, Minoru', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Yamano, Satoko', 'Mizutani, Yuuko', 'Gouri, Daisuke']
